trans-unit.source: Specifies the value to pass to a property to cause the property to get its value from another source.
This is known as *ambience*.
This class cannot be inherited.
If a property on a control has ambient behavior, this attribute must be present.

Ambient properties query their parent for their value, for example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
Typically, a visual designer uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute> attribute to decide which value to persist for a property.
This is usually a value that causes the property to get its value from another source.
An example of an ambient value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> as the ambient value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property.

If you have a control on a form and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property of the control is set to a different color than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property of the form, you can reset the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property of the control to that of the form by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> of the control to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> class, given a Boolean value for its value.
The value of this attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> class, given an 8-bit unsigned integer for its value.
The value of this attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> class, given a Unicode character for its value.
The value of this attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> class, given a double-precision floating-point number for its value.
The value of this attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> class, given a 16-bit signed integer for its value.
The value of this attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> class, given a 32-bit signed integer for its value.
The value of this attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> class, given a 64-bit signed integer for its value.
The value of this attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> class, given an object for its value.
The value of this attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> class, given a single-precision floating point number for its value.
The value of this attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> class, given a string for its value.
The value of this attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> class, given the value and its type.
The of the value parameter.
The value for this attribute.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref>.
`true` if the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref>.
Gets the object that is the value of this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref>.
The object that is the value of this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref>.
